title: We AGREE with the CDC! Why Tucker Carlson Is Right About Masking Kids
description:
Liberals are big mad over Tucker Carlson's recent mask comments. Here’s the thing: He’s 100% RIGHT! We explain why. Also, why don’t cops “shoot the leg”?? Well, today, we run a controlled experiment, mimicking recent police shootings with precision paintball guns.

NEW MERCH! https://crowdershop.com/​ 

GET TODAY'S SHOW NOTES with SOURCES: https://www.louderwithcrowder.com/show-notes-tucker-carlson-cdc
